description: Personality trait definitions and metadata for UI builders

systemPrompt.name: System Prompt
systemPrompt.description: Full identity and role instructions - defines WHO the persona is and their core responsibilities
systemPrompt.placeholder: I am a senior fitness coach at KxGrynde Fitness. I specialize in personalized training programs and holistic wellness approaches...
systemPrompt.helpText: Describe yourself in first person (I am...). We'll automatically convert this to the proper format for the AI.
systemPrompt.conversionNotes: Uses context-aware pronoun replacement with proper capitalization

personalityQuirks.name: Personality Quirks & Mannerisms
personalityQuirks.description: Specific behaviors, speech patterns, catchphrases, and unique mannerisms
personalityQuirks.placeholder: e.g., 'Frequently calls people bro', 'Uses slang like let me axe you instead of ask'
personalityQuirks.helpText: Add specific quirks that make this persona unique. Each quirk should be a short, clear behavior or speech pattern.
examples: Likes to trash talk in a supportive way
Uses slang: 'let me axe you' instead of 'ask'

core.name: Core Personality Traits
core.description: Essential traits that every persona should have defined

traits.name: Enthusiasm
traits.description: Energy level, hype, and intensity in communication

interpretations.9-10: Extremely energetic and hype-driven

examples.low: I can help you with that.
examples.high: I'm SO PUMPED to help you crush this! Let's GO!

traits.name: Warmth / Friendliness
traits.description: How approachable, soft, or inviting the persona feels

interpretations.9-10: Exceptionally warm, nurturing, and inviting

examples.low: I'm here to assist with your inquiry.
examples.high: Hey friend! I'm so happy you're here, let's make this amazing together!

traits.name: Professionalism
traits.description: Formality, correctness, and polish in language

interpretations.9-10: Highly formal, corporate language

examples.low: Yeah totally, lemme help ya with that!
examples.high: I would be pleased to assist you with this matter.

traits.name: Assertiveness
traits.description: How directly they push towards goals and CTAs

interpretations.9-10: Highly assertive, strongly drives toward goals

examples.low: If you'd like, you could consider signing up...
examples.high: Let's get you signed up right now - what's your email?

traits.name: Empathy
traits.description: Ability to soften messages, acknowledge feelings, adjust tone

interpretations.1-2: Direct and factual, minimal emotional acknowledgment
interpretations.9-10: Deeply empathetic, mirrors and validates emotions extensively

examples.low: That's incorrect. Here's the right answer.
examples.high: I totally understand that can be frustrating - let me help you through this gently.

traits.name: Humor / Playfulness
traits.description: How often jokes, banter, metaphors, or lightness appear

interpretations.5-6: Regular use of humor and playfulness
interpretations.9-10: Constantly playful, heavy use of humor and wit

examples.low: Our pricing is competitive and transparent.
examples.high: Our prices? So good, they're practically giving themselves away! ðŸ˜„

traits.name: Confidence
traits.description: Tone strength - from gentle helper to alpha expert

interpretations.9-10: Alpha expert, commanding presence

examples.low: I think this might work for you, but I'm not 100% sure...
examples.high: This is absolutely the right solution for you. Trust me on this.

traits.name: Sales Aggression
traits.description: How quickly they move toward conversion steps

interpretations.1-2: Very passive, waits for user to ask
interpretations.9-10: Highly aggressive, constant conversion push

examples.low: Feel free to reach out if you'd like more info.
examples.high: Let's lock this in - I need your email and phone number to get you started NOW.

traits.name: Verbosity
traits.description: Response length - from short replies to detailed explanations

interpretations.9-10: Very thorough, comprehensive responses

examples.low: Yes. It's $50/month.
examples.high: Great question! Our membership is $50/month, which includes unlimited access to all facilities, group classes, personal training consultations, and our mobile app with custom workout plans. Many members find this to be excellent value compared to other options in the area.

traits.name: Technicality
traits.description: How jargon-heavy or educational the persona speaks

interpretations.3-4: Simple terms with minimal technical words
interpretations.5-6: Balanced mix of technical and plain language
interpretations.9-10: Highly technical, expert-level language

examples.low: We'll help you get healthier.
examples.high: We'll optimize your VO2 max through periodized HIIT protocols.

traits.name: Empathic Emotionality
traits.description: How dramatically they mirror emotion

interpretations.9-10: Dramatic empathic responses, intense emotion matching

examples.low: I understand you're concerned.
examples.high: Oh no, that sounds SO tough! I can totally feel how frustrated you must be right now!

traits.name: Humor Style
traits.description: Edginess vs safety of humor

interpretations.9-10: Bold humor, trash talk, edgy jokes

examples.low: Our gym is pretty great! ðŸ˜Š
examples.high: Bro, our gym will make other gyms look like they're napping. No cap.

advanced.name: Advanced Traits
advanced.description: Optional traits for sophisticated persona customization

traits.name: Response Pace / Delay
traits.description: Chunking and delay behavior for more human-like responses

interpretations.9-10: Very slow, highly realistic human pacing

traits.name: Directness
traits.description: How blunt vs indirect communication is

interpretations.9-10: Extremely blunt and concise

examples.low: Perhaps you might consider possibly exploring the option of...
examples.high: Do this. It's the right move.

traits.name: Risk Aversion
traits.description: Tendency to avoid sensitive topics

interpretations.1-2: Bold, willing to discuss any topic
interpretations.9-10: Extremely cautious, avoids all sensitive areas

traits.name: Branded Language Density
traits.description: How often custom terminology appears

interpretations.9-10: Constant use of brand-specific terms and phrases

examples.low: Our gym has great equipment.
examples.high: Our FitZone Powerhouse features ProLift stations and MaxCore technology.

traits.name: Persona Character Acting
traits.description: How in character vs plain helpful assistant

interpretations.9-10: Full character immersion with accents, slang, signature lines

examples.low: I'm here to help you.
examples.high: Yo champ! *flexes* King Mo's got your back, let's get you SWOLE!

traits.name: Emoji Frequency
traits.description: How often emojis are used

interpretations.9-10: Heavy emoji usage in most messages

examples.low: That's great news.
examples.high: That's great news! ðŸŽ‰ðŸ”¥ðŸ’ªâœ¨ðŸŽŠ

traits.name: Formality
traits.description: Overall formality level (similar to professionalism)

interpretations.9-10: Extremely formal and structured

traits.name: Question Ratio
traits.description: Percent of messages that end with questions

interpretations.9-10: Almost always ask questions to drive conversation

examples.low: Our gym is great. You should join.
examples.high: What are your fitness goals? When can you start? Ready to transform?

business.name: Business-Focused Traits
business.description: Traits specifically for SMB lead generation and sales

traits.name: Lead Conversion Drive
traits.description: How strongly they push toward contact capture

interpretations.1-2: Passive, wait for user to volunteer info
interpretations.7-8: Strong focus on capturing contact info
interpretations.9-10: Aggressive lead capture, persistent requests

examples.low: Feel free to share your email if you'd like updates.
examples.high: I'll need your name, email, and phone number before we continue.

traits.name: Supportiveness
traits.description: Level of emotional affirmation

interpretations.9-10: Extremely supportive, constant positive reinforcement

examples.low: Okay.
examples.high: You're doing AMAZING! I'm so proud of you! Keep crushing it!

traits.name: Education Depth
traits.description: How teacher-like the persona is

interpretations.9-10: Comprehensive education, deep explanations

examples.low: Do 10 pushups.
examples.high: Pushups engage your pectorals, triceps, and deltoids. Let me explain proper form to prevent injury and maximize effectiveness...

traits.name: Personalization Level
traits.description: How much they tailor responses to user details

interpretations.7-8: Strong personalization based on user info
interpretations.9-10: Highly personalized, references many user details

examples.low: Here's our standard membership.
examples.high: Based on your goal to run a marathon and your busy schedule, Sarah, I recommend our early morning running club package.

energeticSales.name: Energetic Sales Agent
energeticSales.description: High-energy, warm, assertive persona for fitness/sales

friendlyHelper.name: Friendly Helper
friendlyHelper.description: Warm, supportive, casual persona for customer service
